User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user in the SkillHub application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

Role.title: Role
Role.description: Represents a user role (student, teacher, sponsor, admin) in the SkillHub application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Role entity.

name.description: Name of the role (e.g., student, teacher, sponsor, admin).

permissions.description: List of permissions granted to this role.

Course.title: Course
Course.description: Represents a course listed in the SkillHub application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Course entity.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile data. Includes standard user information.

/roles/{roleId}.description: Stores role definitions (student, teacher, sponsor, admin) and their associated permissions.

/courses/{courseId}.description: Stores course information. Includes denormalized instructorId for easier querying and security rules.
